body: Just got back from an amazing vacation in Italy! I had so much fun exploring the city, trying new foods, and relaxing on the beach. Can't wait to plan my next adventure!
Feeling grateful for my family and friends who always support me through thick and thin. I don't know what I would do without them!
I said yes! I'm engaged to the love of my life and couldn't be happier. Can't wait to start this next chapter together!
Can't believe it's already been 5 years since I graduated from MIT. Time really flies! Shoutout to all my fellow alumni out there.
Missing San Francisco so much right now. Wish I could teleport there and relive some of my favorite memories.
Just finished a killer workout at the gym. Feeling tired but accomplished!
What's everyone up to this weekend? Any fun plans or events happening?
Had the best time at Rock Am Ring last night! The energy was amazing and I danced the night away. Already looking forward to the next one!
So proud of my team for winning that match. They worked so hard and deserve all the recognition they're getting!
Just tried sushi for the first time and it was amazing! Can't believe I've been missing out on this my whole life.
Excited to announce that I'm starting a new job at CD Projekt Red next month. It's a big change, but I'm ready for the challenge!
Feeling grateful for the little things today, like a warm cup of coffee and a good book. Sometimes it's the simple pleasures that make all the difference.
Can't stop listening to Linkin Park. It's been on repeat for days and I'm still not sick of it.
Just finished binge-watching Breaking Bad and it was amazing. Any recommendations for my next watch?
So excited for birthday party coming up! Time to start planning the decorations and menu.
Had a great conversation with my grandma today. It's amazing how a good talk can lift your spirits and put everything in perspective.
Just finished a DIY project I've been working on for weeks. It's not perfect, but I'm proud of what I accomplished.
Can't believe how fast Sparky is growing up! Seems like just yesterday they were a little puppy.
Enjoying some quality me-time today with a spa day at home. Relaxation mode: on.
Feeling inspired after attending Digital Dragons today. So many great speakers and ideas to implement in my work.
Just finished reading Slight Edge and it was amazing. Highly recommend it to anyone looking for a good read.
Can't believe it's already fall! Time to break out the cozy sweaters and pumpkin spice everything.
Excited to announce that I'm starting a new chapter in my life and moving to Boston. It's a big change, but I'm ready for new adventures and opportunities.
Had the best time hanging out with pals last night. We always have the best laughs and memories together.
So grateful for the kind gestures and support from my community during tough times. It really makes a difference.
Just tried programming for the first time and loved it! Can't wait to explore more and improve my skills.
